summary: Deep Agents CLI is an interactive terminal for building agents with persistent memory, supporting various operations like file handling, shell commands, web search, and more.

structure.title: Deep Agents CLI
structure.summary: Deep Agents CLI is an interactive terminal for building agents with persistent memory, supporting file operations, shell commands, web search, HTTP requests, task planning, memory storage, and human approval.

nodes.path: cli > Deep Agents CLI > Quick start
nodes.title: Quick start
nodes.summary: Guide to setting up and using the Deep Agents CLI, including API key setup and basic commands.

nodes.title: Configuration
nodes.summary: Describes command-line options and CLI commands for configuring and managing Deep Agents.

nodes.path: cli > Deep Agents CLI > Interactive mode
nodes.title: Interactive mode
nodes.summary: Interactive mode in Deep Agents CLI supports slash commands, bash commands, and keyboard shortcuts for efficient session management.

nodes.path: cli > Deep Agents CLI > Set project conventions with memories
nodes.title: Set project conventions with memories
nodes.summary: Describes how agents store and use information in markdown files for project conventions, enhancing task execution and learning.

nodes.path: cli > Deep Agents CLI > Use remote sandboxes
nodes.title: Use remote sandboxes
nodes.summary: Execute code in remote sandboxes for safety, clean environments, parallel execution, long-running tasks, and reproducibility. Configure and use remote sandboxes with the CLI.
